login.safeHavenDesc: Mitch√© is a safe haven for giving and receiving help while maintaining anonymity. Here, requests for help are 'Echoes', and offers of support are 'Offerings'. Your identity is protected, allowing dignity and compassion to flourish.
login.agreement: By entering, you agree to the principles of confidentiality and mutual respect that our platform is built upon.

auth.identityChoiceInfo: You will choose your symbolic identity after creating your account.

welcome.title: Welcome to Our Sanctuary
welcome.subtitle: Before you begin, let's explore the core principles that shape our world.

echoes.title: Echoes: Calls of Hope
echoes.description: When you need help, you cast an 'Echo'. It is your anonymous request that reaches the community.

offerings.title: Offerings: Seeds of Compassion
offerings.description: You can respond to Echoes with 'Offerings' - either material help or words of encouragement.

identity.title: Your Identity: A Hope Bearer
identity.description: Here, you are known by your chosen name and symbol, ensuring dignity and safety for all.

identity.title: Forge Your Symbolic Identity
identity.subtitle: Choose the name and symbol that will represent your light in this community. This is the shield that protects your true identity.

confirm.title: You Are Now Part of the Tapestry
confirm.subtitle: This is your identity as a Hope Bearer. Remember, behind every symbol lies a human heart.

sanctuary.quote: "May your light be an echo in this world"

echoes.title: Wall of Echoes
echoes.subtitle: Here, voices rise and hands meet
echoes.emptyTitle: The Wall is a Sanctuary of Peace
echoes.emptySubtitle: Its silence is a sign that for now, needs are met. New echoes will appear as they are cast by the community.

helpModal.bodyHelp: You are about to start helping with this request. The requester will be notified. Please contact them at the number below to proceed.
helpModal.dummyPhone: (This is a dummy number for demonstration purposes)

encourageModal.title: Send a Message of Encouragement
encourageModal.placeholder: Write your message here... Your words might be the light someone needs.

createRequest.title: Launch Your Echo
createRequest.subtitle: Every request is a seed of hope. Describe what you need with sincerity.

tapestry.title: Hope Tapestry
tapestry.subtitle: A living archive of resilience and transformation, woven from threads of giving
tapestry.emptyTitle: No threads in this section yet.
tapestry.emptySubtitle: But the tapestry grows every day, thanks to people like you.

story.revealed: A new story of hope, revealed to the world through courage and compassion.
story.anonymous: The glow of a silent star, felt by many, known by few. A testament to quiet strength.

nomination.title: Your Light Has Reached the Temple
nomination.subtitle: You have been nominated for the Hope Bearer Award. Will you step forward, or remain a silent star?
nomination.confirmRevealBody: By choosing to reveal your identity, your real name and photo will be publicly displayed on your story's thread in the 'Hope Tapestry'. This powerful act connects a face to the hope you've inspired, allowing the community to see and celebrate the person behind the symbol. Are you ready to step into the light?
nomination.realNamePlaceholder: Your name as it will appear in celebration
nomination.confirmAnonymousBody: By choosing to remain anonymous, your symbolic name and icon will continue to represent you in the 'Hope Tapestry'. Your story will inspire others while your identity remains a cherished secret. Is this your chosen path?
nomination.finishedTitle: Whether your name is known or not, your legacy is eternal.
nomination.finishedSubtitle: Your choice will be honored with all due reverence.
